Don't worry..

I've got you!

Aside from “how do I pronounce your name?... the SECOND most common question I am asked is..

What actually is transformation coaching?

Awesome question! Transformation coaching helps you make profound changes to ultimately live happy and fulfilled. Together we take an inside out approach. So unlike traditional life coaching which centres around goals and external changes for surface level shifts, we go a little deeper….but not moonlight meditation deep, don’t worry. Through our work I help you find and harness your innate power and resilience (whether you believe it’s there or not). We follow a process of unlocking blockers and mindful self-awareness so you can step beyond the psychology that’s been holding you back from living a life you love.

Who is this for?

Do you know...

what you want but stumble at repetitive hurdles?

Do you feel...

like you aren’t living authentically but don’t know how to change it?

Do you have...

a sense something is missing but you can’t work out what?

Do you make...

positive changes to your life but still don’t feel successful or fulfilled?

“Mhairi was hugely inspirational and made me realise I can do anything I set my mind on”

- Jo. C

How my program works:

Step one

Discovery call

This is one of my favourite parts! We do an intensive deep dive into all things you. We look at what’s important to you, what’s working for you in your life, what’s working against you and start to pull out repetitive themes, blocks and goals.

Step two

DISC

DISC is an incredibly powerful tool, to provide a deeper understanding of self. Following completion of your online questionnaire we review your fears, motivators and drivers leaving you with the knowledge to improve your communication, empower your relationships and develop your confidence.

Step three

Bi-weekly coaching

Then the fun really begins. Our coaching sessions will be structured in a way that becomes familiar, fun, easy and always centred around you. We work with your conscious and subconscious to fuel your journey. Following my 6 step program we uncover your specific strategy for success and tap into it to radically elevate your life..

The coaching

quiz

Find out if coaching is for you in less than 60 seconds

Tell me more

The coaching quiz

Personal life coaching is not for everyone. There are some who would benefit from a life coach, but they aren't ready to make the changes necessary to better their lives. After the quiz you will have a clearer idea and understanding as to whether a life coach is right for you.

Coaching packages

Swift

You need a specific change and you need it fast? Then Swift is for you. Together we take an intensive 5-6 week journey to get you where you want to be, quickly.

signature

Not sure what the issue is let alone how to change it? Signature has your name written all over it. This voyage of discovery will help you identify where you are, where you want to be and more importantly how to get there.

Shift

If personal metamorphosis were a coaching program, this would be it! We take a deep and enlightening three step journey through self discovery, self release and self direction. Want to live your dream life? Make the Shift.
